urls.title: Tesla defied county orders so it could restart production. Days later, workers tested positive for the coronavirus.
urls.description: Elon Musk defied a public health order so his company could resume building cars in Fremont, Calif., last month.

text: Tesla defied county orders so it could restart production. Days later, workers tested positive for the coronavirus. https://t.co/rDI2uhpyLl

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
